name: Snifferplayer
tagline: Video player playing video source from Youku.com, Tudou.com, etc.
body:
############# Abstract
This is an open source video player, which sniffer-then-to-play video resources from video-websites such as Youku.com, Tudou.com etc.. It offers you an alternative way to access those resources rather than only by FlashPlayer inside webpage.


############# Licence
This source code (excluding dependent libraries) is published under PUBLIC DOMAIN, which means you can do anything to/with this code. The only thing you need to be noticed is "let me know".

Notice that the dependent libraries such as ffmpeg, SDL have their own licences, check them out from their website.

############# Build
Notice it only supports building in win32 with MSVC 2010.

==========

1. Download and install Microsoft Visual Studio Express 2010.

2. Download "C++ boost 1.50.0" or higher from "http://www.boost.org", extracting it into "E:\boost_1_50_0"(you can change this path from project setting) then build it.

3. Download "log4cpp" from "http://log4cpp.sourceforge.net/" then extracting it into "E:\log4cpp_1_1"(you can change this path from project setting) then build it.

4. Check out the source code.

5. Open "smartplayer\smartplayer.sln" with MSVC 2010 then you can build it.

==========

If you want to rebuild the affiliating ffmpeg, do it in MinGW. Please follow the instructions from ffmpeg official website "http://www.ffmpeg.org"

############# Authors and Contributors
renning22

############# Support or Contact
Feel free to contact me.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
